plot: A writer investigating the execution of a serial killer known as &"The Haymarket Strangler&" 20 years previously begins to suspect that the wrong man might have been hanged. However, when he picks up a scalpel used by the murderer, he finds himself possessed by the killer's spirit and begins committing similar murders.
title: Grip of the Strangler
plot_es: A writer investigating the execution of a serial killer known as &"The Haymarket Strangler&" 20 years previously begins to suspect that the wrong man might have been hanged. However, when he picks up a scalpel used by the murderer, he finds himself possessed by the killer's spirit and begins committing similar murders.
